item.title: 菲律宾 10 月通胀稳定，可能支持降息
item.description: 菲律宾的通货膨胀率在 10 月份趋于稳定，保持在中央银行的目标范围以下，可能支持基准利率的进一步下调。【原文：Inflation in the Philippines steadied in October, staying below the central bank’s target range and may support further cuts in benchmark interest rates.】

item.title: 卢拉预计将暂别 COP30，讨论委内瑞拉问题
item.description: 路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦总统预计将从他在巴西主办的联合国气候峰会中抽身，参加本周末在哥伦比亚举行的有关委内瑞拉危机的讨论。【原文：President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva is expected to take a break from the United Nations climate summit he’s hosting in Brazil to join discussions on the Venezuela crisis in Colombia this weekend.】

item.title: 美国经济从绿色退市中获胜，除非世界各国纷纷效仿
item.description:
彭博经济学研究人员写道，如果全球集体放弃绿色政策，全球经济将萎缩。【原文：

If the world collectively retreated from green policies, the global economy would shrink, Bloomberg Economics researchers write. 

】

item.title: 森信托首席执行官为日本的公寓式酒店寻求外国合作伙伴
item.description: 森信托株式会社首席执行官表示，该公司正在寻找海外合作伙伴，以便在日本推出可以像酒店客房一样出租的公寓，从而从日本旅游业的繁荣中获利。【原文：Mori Trust Co. is looking for overseas partners to launch condominiums in Japan that can be rented out like hotel rooms, its chief executive officer said, as the company seeks to profit from the nation’s tourism boom.】

item.title: 投资者权衡美元和美国利率前景，黄金维持跌势
item.description: 美元升至 5 月份以来的最高点，抑制了需求，黄金创下一周多来的最大跌幅。【原文：Gold held the biggest drop in more than a week after the US dollar rose to the highest since May, blunting demand.】

item.title: 估值担忧冲击科技股，韩国 Kospi 指数暴跌
item.description: 由于对估值的担忧打击了芯片股、国防和造船企业等近期的赢家，韩国股票基准大幅下滑。【原文：South Korea’s equity benchmark slumped as valuation concerns hammered recent winners such as chip stocks, defense and shipbuilders.】

item.title: 伊塔乌预计 "可预见的未来 "拖欠率将保持低位
item.description: Itau Unibanco Holding SA 预计未来几个季度的信贷质量将保持稳定，该银行在巴西投资组合中的拖欠率将继续低于全国的总体拖欠率。【原文：Itau Unibanco Holding SA is expecting its credit quality to stay stable over the next few quarters, with delinquencies within the bank’s Brazilian portfolio set to remain below overall rates across the country.】

item.title: 英国经济研究局（NIESR）称，里夫斯必须实现盈余才能阻止英国债务激增
item.description: 一家领先的经济智库警告说，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）需要实现基本预算盈余，以控制英国 "不可持续 "的债务轨迹。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves needs to run primary budget surpluses, a feat Britain last achieved quarter of a century ago, to get a grip on the country’s “unsustainable” debt trajectory, a leading economic think tank warned.】

item.title: 英国里夫斯将会见保险业首席执行官，进行预算前增长推介
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将于周三在唐宁街会见顶级保险公司的首席执行官们，她将在本月晚些时候的棘手预算案出台前，努力鼓励在金融城进行更多投资。【原文：UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves will meet CEOs from top insurers in Downing Street on Wednesday, as she seeks to encourage more investment in the City ahead of a tricky budget later this month.】

item.title: 政策困境导致外国资金外流，印尼债券受到冲击
item.description: 上个月，外国投资者再次抛售印尼政府债券，这凸显了人们对政府增加开支和提高赤字限额计划的担忧。【原文：Foreign investors sold Indonesian government bonds again last month, underscoring concerns over the government’s plans to increase spending and raise the deficit limit.】

item.title: 黑石支持的食品卫生清洁公司签订锻炼协议
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，Blackstone Inc.支持的 Fortrex 已达成重组协议，贷款人将控制这家陷入困境的食品卫生清洁公司。【原文：Blackstone Inc.-backed Fortrex has reached a restructuring agreement in which lenders will take control of the troubled food sanitation facilities cleaner, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 慧聪网支持的保险科技公司 Exzeo Group 首次公开募股融资 1.68 亿美元
item.description: 由 HCI 集团公司支持的保险技术公司 Exzeo Group Inc.【原文：Exzeo Group Inc., an insurance technology firm backed by HCI Group Inc., raised $168 million in an initial public offering that priced at the midpoint of its marketed range, joining a handful of firms going public during the government shutdown.】

item.title: 日本电产获得 39 亿美元信贷额度，缓解流动性担忧
item.description: 日本电产株式会社从日本 MUFG 银行和 SMBC 获得了 6000 亿日元（39 亿美元）的信贷额度，缓解了人们对这家精密电机制造商在会计问题调查期间可能出现流动性紧张的担忧。【原文：Nidec Corp. secured a ¥600 billion ($3.9 billion) credit line from MUFG Bank Ltd. and SMBC, easing concerns about potential liquidity strains at the maker of precision motors amid an ongoing probe into accounting issues.】

item.title: First Brands 创始人被控洗劫公司
item.description: 起初，销售发票上写的是 179.84 美元。后来，账单上写着 9 271.25 美元--多了 50 倍。【原文：At first, the sales invoice said $179.84. Later, the bill said $9,271.25 – 50 times more.】

item.title: 印度 ChrysCapital 募集 22 亿美元，成为其最大基金
item.description: ChrysCapital Management Co. 公司以 22 亿美元完成了第 10 支私募股权基金的募集，打破了之前的记录，该公司正在工业和医疗保健领域寻求更多交易。【原文：ChrysCapital Management Co. closed its 10th private equity fund at $2.2 billion, beating its previous record as it hunts for more deals in industrials and health care.】

item.title: 报告显示美国库存增加，石油跌幅扩大
item.description: 在一份行业报告显示美国库存出现三个多月来最大增幅后，石油连续第二天下跌。【原文：Oil fell for a second day after an industry report indicated the biggest increase in US inventories in more than three months.】

item.title: 威利斯对修改新西兰央行章程以提高透明度持开放态度
item.description: 新西兰财政部长尼古拉-威利斯（Nicola Willis）表示，一旦新行长安娜-布雷曼（Anna Breman）上任，她愿意修改央行利率制定委员会的章程，以提高政策决定的透明度。【原文：New Zealand Finance Minister Nicola Willis has signaled she’s open to revising the charter for the central bank’s rate-setting committee to enhance transparency around policy decisions once new governor Anna Breman is installed.】

item.title: Medline 披露更多首次公开募股承销商和不断增长的销售额
item.description: Medline Inc. 增加了数十名顾问，有望成为今年美国最大的首次公开募股之一。【原文：Medline Inc. has added dozens of advisers to what is expected to be one of the year’s the biggest US initial public offerings.】

item.title: 中国斥资 4700 亿美元开采石油和天然气仅仅是个开始
item.description:
国内生产对中国政府的能源安全至关重要。官员们不会放过任何机会。【原文：

Domestic production is vital to Beijing’s view of energy security. Officials are leaving nothing to chance.

】

item.title: 在中国业务增长 1600% 的华为合作伙伴 Seres 将在香港上市
item.description: 中国最畅销豪华车制造商 Seres 集团股份有限公司将于本周三开始在香港上市交易，该公司在公开招股中募集了 143 亿港元（18 亿美元）资金，为香港今年的新股上市交易再添辉煌。【原文：Seres Group Co., maker of China’s best-selling luxury vehicle, will start trading in Hong Kong on Wednesday after raising HK$14.3 billion ($1.8 billion) during its public offering and adding to the city’s banner year for new listings.】

item.title: 全球贸易中的人民币需求促使埃伯里增加中国员工人数
item.description: 受本地公司扩大海外贸易和人民币在全球商务中使用日益增多的推动，英国跨境支付公司 Ebury 正寻求在中国增加招聘。【原文：UK-based cross-border payment firm Ebury is looking to ramp up hiring in China, driven by local companies expanding trade overseas and the increasing use of the yuan in global commerce.】

item.title: 雅诗兰黛继承人家族寻求出售 10 亿美元股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，雅诗兰黛公司（Estee Lauder Companies Inc.【原文：The family of Estee Lauder Companies Inc. heir Leonard Lauder is seeking to raise about $1 billion in a sale of shares in the beauty products maker, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 华尔街暴跌后亚洲股市低迷：市场综述
item.description: 风险厌恶情绪笼罩华尔街，拖累科技股和加密货币下跌，同时提振债券和美元，周三亚洲股市承压。【原文：Asian stocks look under pressure Wednesday after a risk-off mood gripped Wall Street, dragging down tech shares and cryptocurrencies while lifting bonds and the dollar.】

item.title: 特朗普称已会见瑞士领导人，并下令举行更多贸易谈判
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他会见了瑞士代表，并宣布将举行更多的贸易谈判，因为这个欧洲国家正在寻求降低高于任何其他发达国家的关税率。【原文：US President Donald Trump said he met with representatives from Switzerland and announced additional trade talks, as the European nation seeks to reduce a tariff rate that ranks higher than any other developed nation.】

item.title: 亚太经合组织领导人在特朗普和习近平之间走钢丝
item.description:
今天的 "亚洲大视野 "播客：在亚太经合组织峰会之后，亚洲最大的经济体如何应对中美之间日益紧张的关系。【原文：

On today’s Big Take Asia podcast: On the heels of the APEC summit, how Asia’s biggest economies are navigating rising tensions between the US and China.

】

item.title: Ovintiv 将以 27 亿美元收购加拿大 NuVista 能源公司
item.description: 总部位于丹佛的石油和天然气公司 Ovintiv Inc. 同意收购 NuVista Energy Ltd，交易价值约为 27 亿美元，从而扩大了其在加拿大的业务。【原文：Ovintiv Inc., a Denver-based oil and natural gas company, agreed to buy NuVista Energy Ltd in a deal valued at about $2.7 billion, expanding its operations in Canada.】

item.title: 澳元兑新西兰元汇率升至 12 年新高
item.description: 澳元兑新西兰元汇率攀升至 12 年来的新高，原因是这两个邻国的货币政策前景不尽相同。【原文：Australia’s dollar climbed to a 12-year high against its New Zealand counterpart, driven by a diverging monetary policy outlook between the neighboring nations.】

item.title: 温克艾沃斯创办的双子座公司进军预测市场
item.description: 据熟悉计划的人士透露，由亿万富翁泰勒-温克艾沃斯和卡梅隆-温克艾沃斯创办的加密货币交易所双子座空间站公司正准备提供预测市场合约。【原文：Gemini Space Station Inc., the crypto exchange founded by billionaires Tyler and Cameron Winklevoss, is preparing to offer prediction market contracts, according to people familiar with plans.】

item.title: 日本黑熊袭击事件引发军方反应，助长了 "备忘录 "股票的上涨
item.description: 几周来，日本各地接连发生致命的熊袭击事件，成为当地新闻的焦点，促使政府向受影响最严重的地区之一派遣士兵。备忘录交易商纷纷追捧两家鲜为人知的公司的股票，这两家公司的产品为远足者和农村居民提供了一定的保护。【原文：A spate of fatal bear attacks across Japan has dominated local news for weeks, prompting the government to send soldiers to one of the most affected areas. Meme traders have piled into the shares of two little-known companies whose products offer some protection for hikers and rural residents.】

item.title: 经济疲软，新西兰失业率创九年新高
item.description: 由于经济疲软导致企业不愿招收新员工，新西兰第三季度的失业率升至九年来的最高点。【原文：New Zealand’s jobless rate rose to the highest in nine years in the third quarter as the weak economy made firms reluctant to take on new workers.】
